question:
The parents of your Australian firend Chris have invited you to a surprise birthday party for for him/her


write a letter to Chris's parents. In your letter
Say why you think Chris will enjoy the surprise party
Explain why you won't be able to attend the party
Give the of a paln to see Chris at a different time
text: Hope this finds you well. First of all, let me thank you for inviting me to the surprise party that is going to organize for Chris's birthday.
Chris always loves surprises, I can remember how he enjoyed the surprise gift that I gave him at his graduation. So, this party will be  huge for him.

Unfortunately, I won't be able to join you all at this time, because I have an important meeting scheduled on the same day. I am not in a position to make changes to the meeting, since we are expecting some foreigners to participate in the meeting, and I am really sorry for that.
However, I hope to visit Australia a couple of weeks after Chris's birthday,so we can go on the trip that we are planning for ages now. How's the climate over there? Here, we are sweating.
Let me stop here, hope to hear from you soon.
